item.title: 越南政党名单显示总理、总统领导地位削弱
item.description: 越南共产党选举产生了新的最高决策机构，其中一些知名人物缺席，特别是现任总理和总统，这预示着新一届领导层的阵容。【原文：Vietnam’s Communist Party has elected a new top decision-making body with some high-profile names missing, notably the current prime minister and president, suggesting a new leadership line-up.】

item.title: 据报道，约旦当局利用Cellebrite技术入侵异见人士手机
item.description: 以色列数字取证公司Cellebrite被指控助长侵犯人权行为，此前约旦当局据称利用其技术破解活动人士的手机。【原文：Israeli digital forensics company Cellebrite has been accused of enabling human rights violations after authorities in Jordan allegedly used its technology to break into the mobile phones of activists.】

item.title: 芬坎蒂尼首席执行官称欧洲需在国防领域"更有效地花钱"
item.description: 芬坎蒂尼公司首席执行官皮耶罗贝托·福尔吉耶罗表示，在当前地缘政治风险不断加剧的背景下，加强欧洲各国间的协调至关重要，这有助于提升产能并加速发展进程。【原文：Fincantieri SpA Chief Executive Officer Pierroberto Folgiero says closer coordination among different European countries is critical to bolstering capacity and speeding up development at a time of mounting geopolitical risk.】

item.title: 哈里伯顿将油田设备出口至全球，随着压裂技术走向世界
item.description: 随着美国页岩油气产量增速放缓，这家石油服务巨头正将闲置设备转移至海外。【原文：The oil-services giant is moving idled equipment overseas as US shale growth slows】

item.title: 中国在人工智能领域落后是“童话故事”，Mistral首席执行官如是说
item.description: Mistral首席执行官亚瑟·门施表示，所谓中国人工智能技术落后于美国的论调纯属“童话故事”。【原文：Claims that Chinese technology for artificial intelligence lags the US are a “fairy tale,” Arthur Mensch, the chief executive officer of Mistral, said.】

item.title: Nedbank以溢价收购NCBA，加速东非市场布局
item.description: Nedbank集团正实施一项计划，旨在扩大其在非洲大陆的业务版图，挑战更大规模的竞争对手。这家南非金融机构正以溢价收购肯尼亚NCBA集团的多数股权。【原文：Nedbank Group Ltd. is executing a plan to boost its footprint across the continent and challenge bigger rivals, with the South African lender offering a premium to buy a majority stake in Kenya’s NCBA Group Plc.】

item.title: 米莱在达沃斯盛赞阿根廷与中国防务合作
item.description: 哈维尔·米莱对阿根廷与中国的蓬勃发展的经济联系进行了有力辩护，称该国除了寻求与美国的协议外，别无选择只能推进与北京的贸易。【原文：Javier Milei issued a robust defense of Argentina’s burgeoning economic ties with China, saying that his country had little choice but to pursue trade with Beijing — while seeking a deal with the US.】

item.title: 刚果计划通过首次发行欧元债券筹集7.5亿美元
item.description: 刚果民主共和国正准备于4月通过首次国际债券发售筹集7.5亿美元，并将把所得资金用于基础设施项目。【原文：The Democratic Republic of Congo is preparing to raise $750 million in April with its first international bond sale, and will use the proceeds to fund infrastructure projects.】

item.title: EQT首席执行官在收购科勒公司后瞄准房地产扩张
item.description: 私募股权集团EQT AB在完成一系列战略收购后，计划扩大其现有房地产业务版图，其中包括最新收购的二级市场平台科勒资本有限公司。【原文：Private equity group EQT AB wants to expand its existing real estate franchise after making a series of strategic acquisitions, including its latest purchase of secondaries platform Coller Capital Ltd.】

item.title: 墨西哥通胀涨幅低于预期，央行会议前夕
item.description: 墨西哥1月初通胀增速低于预期，市场认为央行在连续12次降息后，下次会议将维持基准利率不变。【原文：Mexico’s inflation accelerated less than expected in early January, as markets see the central bank keeping its benchmark interest rate unchanged at its next meeting after 12 straight cuts.】

item.title: PayPal收购Cymbio，最新代理式商务举措
item.description: PayPal控股公司已同意收购Cymbio——该平台旨在帮助商家通过人工智能聊天机器人销售产品。交易条款未予披露。【原文：PayPal Holdings Inc. agreed to acquire Cymbio, a platform designed to help merchants sell products across AI chatbots. Terms weren’t disclosed.】

item.title: 追逐趋势的交易者激增，恰逢市场剧烈震荡考验模型
item.description: 趋势跟踪基金在2026年伊始展现出全新动能，经过一年屡屡受挫后，其表现已超越股票和债券。【原文：Trend-following funds are starting 2026 with fresh momentum, outperforming stocks and bonds after a year of false starts.】

item.title: 美元持稳，因格陵兰紧张局势缓和引发外汇市场涟漪
item.description: 美元汇率趋稳，而高风险货币表现强劲，因美国收敛收购格陵兰岛的威胁言论，全球市场随之趋于平静。【原文：The dollar stabilized while higher-risk currencies outperformed after a dial-back in US threats about acquiring Greenland calmed global markets.】

item.title: 小型人工智能公司考虑通过人才收购实现增长
item.description: 人工智能初创企业正以首次公开募股开启2026年，并寻求整合交易，因其资本需求日益迫切。【原文：AI startups are starting 2026 with IPOs and looking to consolidation deals, as capital needs intensify.】

item.title: 拉丁美洲出口展现韧性 绕开特朗普关税
item.description: 巴西、阿根廷对外出口创纪录，贸易流向其他地区【原文：Brazil, Argentina post record shipments abroad as trade flows elsewhere】

item.title: 通用融合公司同意通过10亿美元SPAC交易上市
item.description: 通用核聚变公司已同意与一家空白支票公司合并，此项交易有望催生首批公开上市的核聚变技术开发商之一。【原文：General Fusion Inc. has agreed to a merger with a blank-check company in a deal that’s expected to create one of the first publicly traded fusion technology developers.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚养老金改革或伤储户，巨头苏拉集团发出警告
item.description: 拉丁美洲最大的资产管理公司之一警告称，哥伦比亚一项旨在将数十亿美元资金汇回国内的养老金改革提案，最终可能损害劳动者和退休人员的储蓄。【原文：One of Latin America’s largest asset managers is warning that a proposed pension fund reform in Colombia meant to repatriate billions of dollars could end up hurting workers and retiree savings.】

item.title: 先锋集团称人工智能"政权更迭"将推动加拿大股市上涨
item.description: 先锋集团指出，随着人工智能技术的进步推动加拿大生产力提升，该国上市公司有望实现营收与利润率的双重增长。【原文：Canada’s publicly traded companies are set for revenue and margin boosts as advances in artificial intelligence help fuel the country’s productivity, according to Vanguard Group.】

item.title: 比尔·盖茨风险投资基金领投芯片初创企业1.1亿美元融资
item.description: 比尔·盖茨的风险投资基金、微软公司的投资部门以及沙特阿美风险投资公司正向神经磷公司（Neurophos Inc.）注资1.1亿美元。这家芯片公司致力于开发一项新技术，旨在超越用于运行人工智能模型的加速器性能。【原文：Bill Gates’ VC fund, Microsoft Corp.’s investment arm and Saudi Arabia’s Aramco Ventures are investing $110 million in Neurophos Inc., a chip company that aims to develop a new technology capable of outperforming accelerators used to run AI models.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮席卷而来，投资者撕毁了记忆股的投资策略手册
item.description:
人工智能需求被认为具有足够的持久性，足以平滑该行业的常规周期波动。 

【原文：

AI demand is seen as enduring enough to smooth out the sector’s usual cycles. 

】

item.title: 摩根大通建议在特朗普言论后逢低买入国防类股票
item.description: 摩根大通公司表示，本周欧洲防务类股的下跌为投资者提供了增持该领域股票的机会，该领域目前仍保持强劲势头。【原文：This week’s decline in Europe’s defense shares is an opportunity to add to holdings in the still-buoyant sector, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 马斯克——达沃斯最引人瞩目的批评者，将首次亮相
item.description: 亿万富翁埃隆·马斯克将首次出席达沃斯世界经济论坛，此前他与这场年度富豪聚会的组织者已交锋多年。【原文：Billionaire Elon Musk is going to the World Economic Forum in Davos for the first time, after years of trading barbs with the organizers of the annual gathering of plutocrats.】

item.title: 英国承认数据中心规划审批存在失误，活动团体称
item.description: 据挑战该决定的活动团体称，英国政府承认在批准伦敦西部拟建大型数据中心时存在"严重的逻辑错误"，并表示在伦敦法院开庭审理前应撤销该决定。【原文：The UK government said it made a “serious logical error” in approving a proposed large-scale data center west of London, accepting that its decision should be overturned ahead of a London court hearing, according to a campaign group challenging the decision.】

item.title: 贝宁重启美元债券发售，因市场情绪好转
item.description: 贝宁重返市场发行今年首只非洲外币债券，此前因市场波动推迟发行仅一天。【原文：Benin is back in the market selling Africa’s first foreign-currency bond of the year a day after it postponed the issue due to market volatility.】

item.title: 土耳其意外宣布降息幅度低于预期，令市场感到意外
item.description: 土耳其央行连续第五个月下调基准利率，但意外放缓了自去年12月以来的降息步伐。【原文：Turkey’s central bank lowered its main interest rate for the fifth straight month while surprising markets by slowing the pace of cuts from December.】

item.title: 硅谷倾注游说资金与奉承之辞，力图赢得注重交易的特朗普青睐
item.description: 硅谷已掌握在特朗普治下的华盛顿取得成功的诀窍：投入创纪录的资金，频繁造访白宫，尽可能多地奉承总统。【原文：Silicon Valley has learned how to succeed in Donald Trump’s Washington: Spend record amounts. Visit the White House. Flatter the president as often as you can.】

item.title: Coupang投资者敦促美国就韩国待遇展开贸易调查
item.description: Coupang公司的一位主要投资者敦促美国政府对韩国展开调查，指控其对这家在美国上市的电商企业存在歧视性待遇，此举使争端升级，可能波及华盛顿与首尔之间的更广泛贸易关系。【原文：A major investor in Coupang Inc. has urged the US government to investigate South Korea over what it alleges is discriminatory treatment of the American-listed e-commerce company, escalating a dispute that could spill into broader trade relations between Washington and Seoul.】

item.title: 欧洲禁止进口俄罗斯石油引发部分交易商紧张
item.description: 欧盟禁止进口俄罗斯原油制成的燃料，随着该禁令生效，部分贸易商已感到不安——这提醒人们，旨在打击莫斯科的法规可能引发反噬效应。【原文：The European Union’s ban on the import of fuels made from Russian crude has put some traders on edge as the bloc’s curbs enter into force — a reminder of the potential for blowback from regulations that are designed to hurt Moscow.】

item.title: 印度航空利润未达预期，12月运营崩盘造成冲击
item.description: 印度最大航空公司印地戈航空公布的季度利润因一次性费用未达预期，这主要是由于去年12月遭遇前所未有的运营中断，导致近3000个航班取消，同时监管审查也趋于严格。【原文：IndiGo, India’s biggest airline, reported a quarterly profit that missed expectations on one-time charges due to December’s unprecedented disruptions that led to nearly 3,000 flight cancellations and tighter regulatory oversight.】

item.title: 中国人民银行的潘再确认存在进一步宽松政策以支持经济增长的空间
item.description: 中国人民银行行长潘功胜表示，仍有进一步降息和向银行体系注入流动性的空间，这与他上周副手提出的指导方针一致，即2026年将继续实施支持经济增长的货币政策。【原文：China’s central bank governor Pan Gongsheng signaled there is room to further cut interest rates and inject liquidity into the banking system, echoing guidance from his deputy last week to keep monetary policy supportive for growth in 2026.】
